name: unrehearsed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not practised or planned: The interviews appear to be unrehearsed. He was forced to defend his policies in public and to answer unrehearsed questions from ordinary citizens. Related word
rehearse
More examplesFewer examplesMost of each show was unrehearsed and unplanned, with the band playing only what it felt was right for the moment.Along with the usual formalities, there were some unrehearsed lighter moments. There is an appealingly spontaneous, unrehearsed feel to many of the songs, which are sung with simplicity and sincerity.
